Faithwalkers

For we walk by faith, not by sight

Empowering youth to discover their purpose, grow in faith, and build a community that reflects the love of Christ.

We Are Faithwalkers

Faithwalkers is more than just a youth ministry. It's a movement of young people committed to walking in faith, living with purpose, and transforming our world through the power of Christ.

Community

A place to belong and grow with others.

Worship

Encountering Hashem in everything we do.

Our Mission

To raise a generation of disciples who are spiritually grounded, empowered by faith, and ready to walk into their God-given destiny.

Spiritual Growth

Deepening our relationship with Hashem through prayer and study.

Discipleship

Walking alongside each other as we follow Christ's example.

Empowerment

Equipping youth with the tools to live out their purpose.

Our Events

Faithwalkers is a year-round movement. We are active in the streets, in the community, and in the heart of the city, bringing hope and movement wherever we go.

Hashem Youth Conference

Our flagship annual gathering of thousands for a weekend of revival and purpose.

Explore Conference

Evangelism & Outreach

Street ministry and community engagement, taking the message of Christ to the people.

Get Involved

Charity & Service

Impactful service projects helping the vulnerable and showing love through action.

Learn More

Support Drives

Organized drives to provide essentials to families and youth in need across the city.
